item.title: Nagoya in 2 days
item.description:
japan has a big appeal b/c city and culture and countryside. Nagoya is all three (in my mind)

Recently, it seems like everyone I talk to is either planning to visit or returning from Japan. This isn’t just my observation - according to multiple sources, post-covid tourism numbers are through the roof. Many plan their trips around the glitz and glamor of Tokyo and the rich history and culture of Kyoto. But there’s another city with a lot to offer to both first-time and repeat visitors: Nagoya!
